CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(Marks_Obtained__c), ISBLANK(Submission__r.Assignment__r.Max_Marks__c), Submission__r.Assignment__r.Max_Marks__c = 0 ), "", IF( (Marks_Obtained__c / Submission__r.Assignment__r.Max_Marks__c) * 100 >= 90, "A", IF( (Marks_Obtained__c / Submission__r.Assignment__r.Max_Marks__c) * 100 >= 80, "B", IF( (Marks_Obtained__c / Submission__r.Assignment__r.Max_Marks__c) * 100 >= 70, "C", IF( (Marks_Obtained__c / Submission__r.Assignment__r.Max_Marks__c) * 100 >= 60, "D", "F" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Grade Letter
